website_summaries.verdict: Casts a very wide net for missed and made shots that is built to last.
pros: The net is over 12 feet wide and up to 9 feet tall, making it wider than its competitors
The Goalrilla product is easy to fold and store and it can handle a variety of weather conditions
cons: Company sometimes fails to respond to warranty calls and some find it hard to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Torn and no longer stopping the ball - Replaced by seller!
customer_reviews.text: This yard guard was expensive but we hoped it would be worth the money since the basketball would constantly roll down the hill behind the hoop. Unfortunately it has torn and no longer stops the ball when it hits the net. This results in a VERY frustrated basketball player. We went for the more expensive version hoping that meant better quality, but probably should have gone with the less expensive brand. Hoping to receive a replacement under warranty. Update: We received a replacement net very easily and my husband finally installed it. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Foster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for 4 inch square systems as well!
customer_reviews.text: We have a spalding 4 inch square in ground pole system. This was easy to attach and it is very easy to use. Although it is designed for a 5 or 6 inch pole, we had no problems at all adding this to our 4 inch pole. It is stable and does what it claims...keeps the ball on the court and not on my landscape! Great purchase and it is being used..A LOT. Update: We have never taken the guard down. It was been through all of the many changes in NE PA weather. It honestly looks and functions like it's brand new! We still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Went right on my lifetime mammoth basketball hoop. So far works really good and saves me from having to chase a ball down a half acre.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I had to request parts as the original shipment was missing some. When they sent me the new parts, half of them did not fit together and I had to request them again. When I finally got all the parts, I assembled the net, only to find out that I am now missing 2 nylon sleeves that cover up the fiberglass angle supports. Would be a decent product in the $100 price range, but not for what I paid. Also, the company needs a quality control refresher to ensure they actually send you what is on the parts list.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Works just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected! Was easy to setup all by myself in about 20 minutes (if that!). Easy enough to fasten or unfasten the net to/from the pole in a way that my kids can do it without any fuss. Has really saved the frustration of chasing errant balls into the yard. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Had this net up for the entire summer, and plenty of action by teenage boys. Quality is great. I can see how a bar or net can become damaged if someone aggressively falls into it, or is messing around -- but if the boys are reminded to play their ball on the court, this net should provide my son and his friends a few years of fun without any issues at all. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BP Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Updated review 8-8-17  Spalding Arena goal
customer_reviews.text: I reduced my star rating because goalrilla never responded to my warrant issue- the rod on the goal brace broke only 1week after I installed it It works great and was easy to put together. It took about 30 mins. It works very well, and looks decent. Now, my son doesn't have to worry about breaking a window, and the ball doesn't go past the goal. However, we did have a couple of parts (like the "O ring" on the net that was not sowed on correctly) that we're malfunctioned. But I still give it 5 stars because it is an absolutely amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great and works as it should to return the ball
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and works as it should to return the ball, but the installation will have you saying to your son or daughter, "Hey, just get better at shooting so you don't have to go chase the ball, cuz I am not going through installing it, and then all of a sudden, it eases up, and you are done, but it took all of an hour and a half to get it right" Love it now that it is done and the ease of it folding up and out of the way is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and not difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Put this on a Spalding portable basketball system with a 4" square pole. Works well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Does not include post padding, net only.
customer_reviews.text: Great net, but was misled by picture which showed padding around the post. For the price, the padding should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ring

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, seems well made and looks good. I was worried it would not cover a big enough area, but it works great. Did have one square tangled with line from another one and had to cut it....hoping it does not unravel or fray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The yard guard worked great for the first two weeks, then one side of the net broke. The weight of the entire side is supported by a thin piece of material and one small grommet. After two weeks of use, the stitching that held the net to the grommet and material gave out and the entire net on the left hand side came crashing down. We took the net down and restitched it, but the weight of the net is too much and it broke again. We loved the net while it worked. Goalrilla needs to rethink the construction of the net.
customer_reviews.author: Tanr

customer_reviews.title: falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: We invested a lot of money into this. It is already falling apart on December 31st. One day my son shot for several hours with some wind, and that was it. I would never buy from them again, and our return window of course ended at the end of November. We have contacted the company, but we have not had any resolution.
customer_reviews.author: laura webster

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our basketball court!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this product! It keeps the ball from rolling into the neighbor's wet ditch. I only gave it 4 starts because it is not something you can take down in the winter to store and put back up again in the spring due to the bolts at the very top of the yard guard. You will also need two people to install. One who can stabilize the ladder and pass up the tools you will need to tighten the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: christine l madden

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: This is not well built for the price. There is too much slack on one side of the net and the poles that are included are cheap and do not appear to be the correct size. I do not think it will make it more than 1 season with how flimsy it is. The ends of the bottom do not stay flat, they are raised in the air. We could have just constructed something better ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, and working well 1 month in. Some of the poles took some hard shots, and held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily, works great, I hit the net all the time now ;)
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Works with different hoop sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Great product — you get what you pay for. Well constructed and fairly easy to assemble. Included in the box are fittings for a variety of hoop sizes, even non-Goalrilla hoops.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Roman

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson needed this. Nobody make a product of this quality! Fair price. Should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased at how easy it is to use and that ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised and fits perfectly w our MegaSlam Hoops net. I'm very pleased at how easy it is to use and that it keeps my magnolia bush protected!
customer_reviews.author: ASidhu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter requested this item for Christmas. She loves it and it's helping her improve her game.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job of stopping stray balls
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. It does a good job of stopping stray balls. A little expensive, but well constructed. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brent R

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit on my hoop. I would like a refund but I can’t squeeze it back in the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works so perfect to keep the ball from hitting our neighbors car ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so perfect to keep the ball from hitting our neighbors car and keep it from rolling away when we miss the shot.
customer_reviews.author: cbfamily

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long
customer_reviews.text: Love it can't believe it took me so long to get one. One of my best purchases. Easy to put together as well. I even had a movable basketball hoop and it attached perfect and in less than 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than one year. Sad considering I costs over $200
customer_reviews.text: Was very useful after initial setup. Prevented balls from going to back yard. One side broke in 5 months. Second one 6 months after.
customer_reviews.author: GSiv

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a goalrilla basketball goal
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece after installed. I like how the nets raise and lower to allow easier trimming of the yard. Highly recommend for someone trying to keep the basketball out of the neighbors yard and on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Payne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep the ball from rolling into the flower beds and landscaping.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Great backstop and fairly quickly to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great backstop and fairly quickly to put together. This is made for larger poles: we have a Lifetime hoop and I needed to use small wood blocks to pad it out to fit. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I had a cheaper version that included sandbags ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I had a cheaper version that included sandbags on the ground, but that didn't last more than six months. This is good product - especially because it folds for storage that should extend it's life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed according to manufacturers directions and one of the support straps came apart at the seams (literally ) in only 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It works great!! Took about 15-20 min set up. Have had no issues with it. Glad we went with this on vs the cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lengthy set-up but worth it!. It has saved my landscaping!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: This net works perfect to keep the basketball away from the cacti
customer_reviews.text: This net works perfect to keep the basketball away from the cacti!!! I was unsure if our hoop/standard was going to be compatible, (acquired the hoop with the home and no labels on it), but it installed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dose a great job keeping the ball out of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: tparros

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not only does it help keep the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not only does it help keep the ball in the driveway, but also protects the plants and shrubs behind the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with all missed shots nicely, ours doubles as a practice soccer net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great and and is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is a high-quality product. It helps block the basketball from going into our yard. My son loves it. It has good length and height so that it protects the ball from going into the yard. It was so easy for me and my son to assemble. It works so good. Goalrilla is a great brand it this is another great product by them. It also came with a bonus little pad. The net is very strong. Very high quality metal for the poles. I recommend this to anyone who has the same problem as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy two person installation
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy two person installation. This product met our exact needs. We spend more time shooting and substantially less time chasing basketballs into the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive to break
customer_reviews.text: The poles are weak and have already broke the its less than a year old and there is no where to find replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Minicucci

customer_reviews.title: Works well and priced right on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Pro Shot. Folds out of the way. Directions were adequate, took half an hour to set up with tall latter and a friend. Unsure how it will hold with rain and wind, may need to buy a cover or wrap. 4 stars instead of 5 because the packaging could have been better
customer_reviews.author: PrimeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Smart and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Where we had to put our goal is very close to our lot line and the neighbor's landscaping so we thought this might be a good solution. It did not fit our Spalding goal perfectly but we were able to make it work. We've had it for two months and is easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: busymama

customer_reviews.title: need better
customer_reviews.text: net is ripping away from poles at bottom, need better material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: Our new house has a slope on the side of the driveway where the basketball goal is, so we ordered this to stop the endless chasing of basketballs down the hill. It's simple to assemble. We put it together and installed it in less than 30 minutes. And it has solved our problem! Much much less chasing the basketball and much more actual basketball playing. We love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schlieman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install and does protect from arrant shots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and works on a 4" by 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works well, easy to install and works on a 4" by 4 " post.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product, saves neighbors landscape
customer_reviews.text: Have had the product for about a week...easy to install (with the help of a ladder and a friend). Has made out nightly knockout games much more competitive since we aren't running for the ball all the time. Saves the neighbors landscape, too.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: There was to much paint on the bolts. Hard ...
customer_reviews.text: There was to much paint on the bolts. Hard to put the boys on and no safety caps either! Kids luv it :-)
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have a non brand name inground hoop and I wasn't sure if this would work not...it exceeded my expectations. I have 3 daughters between 6-9 years old and this net drastically increased shooting time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sad to report that after only a year
customer_reviews.text: Sad to report that after only a year, the top left part of the net ripped from the stitching completely, and the "U" bar that hold the entire thing in place on the bottom where all the arms meet pulled from the basketball unit and have never been able to make right again. and FYI the net was secured for storage when the net separated from the top of the unit. It should be able to withstand the elements if made for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rynes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily, works well as a basketball backstop and we use it for a street hockey backstop behind the goal. Now we can shoot at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Campman78

customer_reviews.title: Consider alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. Does not catch over 50% of the missed shots. Ended up buying baseball field nets instead - cheaper and works great.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Labeling
customer_reviews.text: One annoying thing is the stitched on label is backwards and upside down. So when you look at the yard guard the label is wrong and appears to be installed incorrectly. However the product works. Just a little annoying astetically
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This net is pricey but you get what you pay for. Set up is easy. It works well for my system.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: expensive but does the job
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and does the job. a bit expensive, but we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: michael carman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, works as advertised, and seems durable. Instructions very clear.
customer_reviews.author: N.D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son seems to play on his court more now since I've gotten your guard
customer_reviews.author: louis w cook

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of support poles failed pretty quickly and needs to be taped in order to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Unless u bought company's hoop - it won't fit. Waste of $ and effort
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit 5x5 Post
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware, if you have a 5x5 post (not 4.75) this WILL NOT fit. I find it very odd that all the other brackets (5.5x5.5, 6x6, 6x8, and 8x8) are EXACT measurements, but the 5x5 is actually 4.75.
customer_reviews.author: DP Gull

customer_reviews.title: The wrong brand!
customer_reviews.text: I got the basketball goal return hoop I was excited! But wait I have a goaliath basketball hoop not compatible with the goalrilla basketball yard guard .ah ha! The same manufacturer does not sell a return yard defender for a 54" goaliath basketball goal, only comes in a 60" . Sounds like a really small problem that the manufacture should take a look at
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland M. Chatmon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed beware of return policy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Return policy is 30 days by the time we got to installing it, it was past the 30 days so we are stuck with it. The net does not reach the ground therefore the balls go right under the net. The poles are very weak and the net is flimsy. Avoid do not by this. Very disappointed beware of return policy. Company should stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson F.

product_meta.title: Goalrilla Basketball Yard Guard Easy Fold Defensive Net System Quickly Installs on Any Goalrilla Basketball Hoop
product_meta.description: The Goalrilla Yard Guard is a defensive net system that installs on your Goalrilla Goal and keeps ball from bouncing out of the court. The Yard Guard protects your lawn and landscaping, allows players to have more efficient practice, and acts as a safety feature. This innovative accessory is built to last and will change the way you play basketball. The Goalrilla Yard Guard adds safety to your basketball system by keeping balls in the court, so players don't have to chase after them into the street. Usually after a missed shot, a player must chase after the ball, wasting valuable practice time. With the Yard Guard, missed shots stay in the court, allowing the player to quickly retrieve the ball and try again for maximum repetition. The Yard Guard keeps stray balls out of the landscaping. Spanning over 12 feet wide and up to 9 feet tall, the Yard Guard is a significant barrier between your court and your yard. After using your Yard Guard, the net and poles easily fold into a discreet storage position; simply gather the net and poles along the main pole of your Goalrilla system and clip them into place. Then when you are ready to play again, unclip the net and the Yard Guard collapses into place in seconds. The Yard Guard easily installs in minutes by attaching to the main pole of your goal. Included brackets allow the Yard Guard to fit all Goalrilla units with a 5"x 5", 5. 5"x5. 5", 6"x6" or 6"x8" pole. Already have a Universal Pole Pad on your goal? The Yard Guard also includes an adapter that allows you to keep your pole pad and use the Yard Guard at the same time. Goalrilla is known for outstanding performance and quality and the Yard Guard is no exception. With steel poles and a nylon net, the Yard Guard will stand up to years of play and will look great! The Yard Guard comes with a 90-Day Limited . Once the Yard Guard has been installed, you are still able to adjust the height of your Goalrilla goal as usual. Whether you're playing at 7. 5" or 10", the Goalrilla Yard Guard offers the same benefits. Installed Dimensions Width: 153" (12. 75 ft) Height: 9' (at Highest point) to 7' (at Lowest Point)
feature_bullets: REBOUNDS BALL BACK INTO COURT – Defensive Net System that Keeps Balls in the Court
INCREASES SAFETY – No More Chasing Balls into the Street or Landscaping
MAXIMIZE COURT TIME – More Practice Time for Better Skill Retention
CLEAN, DISCREET STORAGE – Easily Folds Behind Pole for Storage
QUICK INSTALLATION – Easily installs on any Goalrilla Goal with a 5"x 5", 5. 5"x5. 5", 6"x6" or 6"x8" Pole (Does NOT Include Pole Pad) Short Description
Material Type: Powder Coated Steel With Nylon Netting

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
